title: Bringing Tales Of WWII To American Radios And Bookshelves
teaser: Bill Shirer brought stories of war in Europe into American homes. NPR's Scott Simon talks with Ken Cuthbertson about his new book, A Complex Fate: William L. Shirer and the American Century.
